sys_documentation.label: Are there are Representative Examples triggers?

sys_documentation.hint:
A trigger would include:
- a rate of interest (e.g. 5.5%p.a. or 6.9% APR) - an amount relating to the cost of credit whether expressed as a sum of money or a proportion of a specified amount. (e.g. 'from £125.36 per month', 'Borrow £10k and only pay £500 in interest')
sys_documentation.label: Are there are Representative Examples triggers?
